title: The Late Show: The Olden days
creator_credit: Mark Gibson, ABC-TV (Australia) and D Generation
brief_description: In the hands of the D-Generation the original ABC series of ‘Rush’ becomes a steamy tale of hope, betrayal and false moustaches set against the rarely-convincing backdrop of the Victorian ‘mudfields’. Also features a featurette at the end of “Olden Days” which is a tribute to that great Australian auteur Warren Perso (starring Tony Martin and Judith Lucy).
